segments.text: Hello , and welcome to IBA . Which service do you require ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Shelly , is it ? I'm here on behalf of my company , so I'll need the Corporate Banking Services .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's no problem ; I can take care of that for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to have a credit check done for my company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If it's this kind of consultancy service , I'll have to direct you to another department , I'm afraid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's no problem . Do you offer any other consulting services ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are many services you can choose from . Why don't you take a look at this leaflet while I find someone who can help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . I'll wait right here , thanks .
segments.speaker: S2
